plot: Driving along a remote country road, a man on his way home from work runs out of petrol, but he finds that's the least of his problems when he runs into some of the locals.
title: The Pass
plot_es: Driving along a remote country road, a man on his way home from work runs out of petrol, but he finds that's the least of his problems when he runs into some of the locals.
plot_en: Driving along a remote country road, a man on his way home from work runs out of petrol, but he finds that's the least of his problems when he runs into some of the locals.
